mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT B.HIR_MENU_CD AS c_HIR_MENU_CD , A.MENU_NM AS p_MENU_NM , B.MENU_CD AS c_MENU_CD , B.MENU_NM AS c_MENU_NM , B.MENU_URL AS c_MENU_URL , B.MENU_ORD AS c_MENU_ORD , B.MENU_DESC AS c_MENU_DESC , B.USE_YN FROM MENU A JOIN MENU B ON A.MENU_CD = B.HIR_MENU_CD WHERE A.MENU_CD != 'M0000' ORDER BY B.MENU_CD, B.MENU_ORD
